manifest.name: vue-slider-component

scripts.build:library: npm run test:unit && npm run package && npm run package:css && npm run typings && npm run sass
scripts.package: vue-cli-service build --mode package --target lib --name vue-slider-component lib/index.ts

> üéö A highly customized slider component

English | [ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá][ch] | [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π][ru]

## üçâ Vue3.x

This is still in beta and may contain unexpected bugs, please use with caution.

#### install

```bash
$ yarn add vue-slider-component@next
# npm install vue-slider-component@next --save
```

#### Breaking Changes

- `value` -> `modelValue`. ([Official API Changes](https://v3-migration.vuejs.org/breaking-changes/v-model.html#v-model))

## ‚ú® Features

- üçñ More customizable
- üëó Multiple style themes
- üê≥ Support for more sliders
- üìå Add marks
- üéâ Support SSR
- üçí Support Typescript

## üìö Documentation

Document: <https://nightcatsama.github.io/vue-slider-component>

Live Demo: <https://jsfiddle.net/NightCatSama/2xy72dod/10547/>

## üéØ install

```bash
$ yarn add vue-slider-component
# npm install vue-slider-component --save
```

## üöÄ Usage

<details><summary>Vue 2</summary>

```vue
<template>
  <vue-slider v-model="value" />
</template>

<script>
import VueSlider from 'vue-slider-component'
import 'vue-slider-component/theme/antd.css'

export default {
  components: {
    VueSlider,
  },

  data() {
    return {
      value: 0,
    }
  },
}
</script>
```

</details>

<details><summary>Vue 3</summary>

```vue
<template>
  <vue-slider v-model="value" />
</template>

<script setup>
import { reactive, toRefs } from 'vue'
import VueSlider from 'vue-slider-component'
import 'vue-slider-component/theme/antd.css'

export default {
  setup() {
    const data = reactive({ value: 0 })
    return toRefs(data)
  },
}
</script>
```

</details>
